subject: Basketball (College)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Chris Burns, an assistant coach at Bryant University, came out as gay in an essay published by Outsports.com, making him the first coach of a top-level American college men’s program to do so.
snippet: Chris Burns, an assistant coach at Bryant University, came out as gay in an essay published by Outsports.com, making him the first coach of a top-level American college men’s program to do so.
